mapper.select: select count(userId) numberOfPeople,Sex,age from (select distinct user_info.UserId userId,year(now())-year(Birthday) age,Sex from order_record,user_info where user_info.UserId=order_record.UserId and order_record.AddTime between #{startTime}and #{endTime} and ShopId=#{shopId} AND OrderStatus='已完成') w group by Sex,age
